name: Blocks Space
description: 1000Blocks Space is a project where users create community-powered NFTs that yield returns in the process of NFT creation. We make digital art creation fun and rewarding. Our Long term vision is to create a unique process of digital art creation and this process would be used by many as a defacto standard. Can you imagine on-demand art creation based on smart contracts? This is exactly what 1000Blocks is about!
